author: senh
title: 3 female journalists stopped from entering Jags locker room
text: BING NEWS: 3 female journalists stopped from entering Jags locker room INDIANAPOLIS (AP) â€” A male usher stopped three female journalists from entering the Jaguars locker room after their loss to the Colts because they were women, asking other men if it was OK before finally allowing them inside.
